summary: A cowboy named Tuck Kirby seeks fame and fortune by capturing an Allosaurus living in the Forbidden Valley and putting it in a Mexican circus. His victim, called the Gwangi, turns out to have an aversion to being shown in public.
cast: James Franciscus|Gila Golan|Richard Carlson|Laurence Naismith|Freda Jackson|Gustavo Rojo|Dennis Kilbane|Mario De Barros|Curtis Arden|Jose Burgos|Robert Rietty
title: El valle de Gwangi
